dict.string:
Markdown.pl <<'EOF'
# reStructeredText (2005-09-21) ## What is it Bla bla bla
## Requirements To install using Darwin Ports:
sudo port install py-docutils
## Syntax Information about RST can be found [here](http://docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html)
## Using it This bundle contain an *rst2html* command which create an HTML version of the current file, and show potential eroros in the error panel. The resulting HTML file is left in the same folder as the current file.
EOF
